emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Kathleen Bryant, L. T. Wilson, Helen Davis, Rebecca McDaniel, Harold Penn, guest of honor Alvin Richardson, Bernice Cathie, Carl Robinson, Edward Stewart, Bill Strawder, Allie Strawder, Robert Lee, and James Royal, gathered for birthday party in Richardson home, Race Street
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1946 reads: "Birthday Celebration - Alvin Richardson, entertained friends at a gay birthday party in his home on 2451 (?) Race Street last week. Guests are shown, left to right: Kathleen Bryant, L.T. Wilson, Helen Davis, Rebecca McDaniel, Harold Penn, Alvin Richardson, Bernice Cathie, Carl Robinson, Edward Stewart, Bill Strawder, Allie Strawder, Robert Lee and James Royal - Harris Photo."
